name: Laptop
description: A high-performance laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and an Intel Core i7 processor.

name: Smartphone
description: A 5G-enabled smartphone with a 48MP camera, 128GB storage, and a sleek design.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30 hours of battery life and premium sound quality.

name: Coffee Maker
description: A programmable coffee maker with a 12-cup capacity and customizable brew strength.

name: Smartwatch
description: A smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and notifications from your smartphone.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with IPX7 waterproofing and 360-degree sound.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K resolution, ultra-fast loading times, and a wide range of games.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with adjustable DPI and a long battery life.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Electric kettle with quick boiling time and an automatic shut-off feature for safety.

name: Air Purifier
description: HEPA air purifier with three filtration stages and a quiet operation mode.
